rme_1999_q1.questionText: According to Christian teaching, God created man and woman on the
rme_1999_q1.subject: religiousMoralEducation
rme_1999_q1.explanation: According to Genesis, God created man and woman on the 6th day.

rme_1999_q2.questionText: Palm Sunday is observed by Christians to remember the
rme_1999_q2.subject: religiousMoralEducation
options: A. birth and baptism of Christ
B. resurrection and appearance of Christ
C. joyful journey of Christ into Jerusalem
D. baptism of the Holy Spirit
E. last supper and sacrifice of Christ
rme_1999_q2.explanation: Palm Sunday commemorates Jesus triumphant entry into Jerusalem.

rme_1999_q3.questionText: God gave Noah and his people the rainbow to remember
rme_1999_q3.subject: religiousMoralEducation
options: A. the floods which destroyed the world
B. the disobedience of the idol worshippers
C. that God would not destroy the world with water again
D. the building of the ark
E. the usefulness of the heavenly bodies
rme_1999_q3.explanation: The rainbow was Gods covenant sign that He would never again destroy the earth by flood.

rme_1999_q4.questionText: All the religions in Ghana believe in
rme_1999_q4.subject: religiousMoralEducation
rme_1999_q4.explanation: All major religions in Ghana acknowledge a Supreme Being/God.

rme_1999_q5.subject: religiousMoralEducation
rme_1999_q5.explanation: Maghrib prayer is observed between Asr and Isha prayers.
